author: FractalDataWorks Framework
name: FractalDataWorks Enhanced Enum
description: Creates a FractalDataWorks Enhanced Enum with interface, base class, collection base, and concrete options

EnhancedEnumName.description: The name of the Enhanced Enum (e.g., Status, Priority, Category)

TemplateNamespace.description: The namespace for the Enhanced Enum

FirstOption.description: Name of the first concrete option

SecondOption.description: Name of the second concrete option

IncludeGlobalCollection.description: Generate global collection attribute for automatic discovery

IncludeDescription.description: Include Description property in the Enhanced Enum

IncludeSort.description: Include SortOrder property for ordering options
